name: gridstack
description: gridstack.js is a jQuery plugin for widget layout

scripts.scss: scss -t compressed --sourcemap=none src/gridstack.scss dist/gridstack.min.css; scss -t expanded --sourcemap=none src/gridstack.scss src/gridstack.css; scss -t expanded --sourcemap=none src/gridstack.scss dist/gridstack.css
scripts.prepublish: npm run uglify; npm run scss

author: Pavel Reznikov <pashka.reznikov@gmail.com>
